title: Designing a Mathematics Learning Management System via Real-Time Online E-Learning Implementation

context.prior_knowledge: College-level foundational mathematics knowledge and experience using online learning platforms
context.additional_context: Exploring effective integration of e-learning tools and LMS for advanced mathematics concept mastery, focusing on real-time interaction and personalized feedback

learning_goals: Learners can apply instructional design strategies to effectively deliver advanced mathematical concepts (e.g., advanced calculus, linear algebra) in online real-time environments
Learners can design learning activities (e.g., quizzes, discussions, collaborative assignments) using LMS functionalities while maintaining learner engagement at 80% or higher
Learners can analyze e-learning data (e.g., progress rates, assessment results) to provide personalized learning feedback
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
